meanings.definition: A small picturesque cave, especially one with religious or historical significance.
meanings.sent1: The explorers discovered ancient grottoes hidden deep in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the beautiful grottoes carved into the mountainside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel made a cozy home in the grottoes, much to the surprise of the hikers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a labyrinth of grottoes, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The grottoes whispered tales of the past, echoing through the silent cave.

meanings.definition: A small picturesque cave, especially one with religious or historical significance.
meanings.sent1: The tour guide led the group through the mystical grottoes, sharing stories of ancient rituals.
meanings.sent2: Local legends spoke of hidden treasures within the sacred grottoes.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be brave explorers, venturing into the grottoes with flashlights in hand.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a dark grottoes, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The grottoes glowed with an otherworldly light, captivating all who entered.
